data.title: Aditi Rao Hydari and Siddharth Engaged Premiere Appearance
data.meta_description: Aditi Rao Hydari and Siddharth captivated the audience at a premiere for 'Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar' with their elegance and style. The duo recently got engaged and showcased their cultural attire, demonstrating their deep bond and mutual admiration. The couple's enchanting presence and coordinated outfits epitomised timeless romance and sophistication. Aditi and Siddharth's relationship began after working together on the 2021 film 'Maha Samudram,' and their engagement was confirmed with a cute selfie shared by Aditi. The couple arrived at the event holding hands and smiling, both looking stunning in their traditional attire. The star-studded cast of 'Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar' includes Manisha Koirala, Sonakshi Sinha, Richa Chadha, Sanjeeda Shaikh, Sharmin Segal, Fardeen Khan, Taha Shah, Shekhar Suman, Adhyayan Suman, and others, and the series is set to stream on Netflix from May 1st, 2024.

The couple arrived at the event holding hands and smiling, both looking stunning in their traditional attire. The star-studded cast of 'Heeramandi: The Diamond Bazaar' includes Manisha Koirala, Sonakshi Sinha, Richa Chadha, Sanjeeda Shaikh, Sharmin Segal, Fardeen Khan, Taha Shah, Shekhar Suman, Adhyayan Suman, and others, and the series is set to stream on Netflix from May 1st, 2024.
